reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant scent and it seems to work
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for a few days now and have noticed my natural scent is pleasant and i feel clean and fresh all through the day. So far, i have not had any bad reactions. The lavender scent is very mild (i was hoping the fragrance wouldn't be overwhelming). And overall, i am very pleased with the products. I will try this in another scent very soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the product
reviews.reviewText: I used the wash gel on my full body the first day I got it, but only applied a little bit. But now I just use the wash gel down below. I used the oil just by applying a few drops to my finger and apply around my v. I haven’t used the soap yet so I can’t leave a review on that items. The smell of lavender is light scented. It doesn’t irritate my skin. Even though my package came later then expected. My wash gel had a dent at the bottom of the bottle, BUT was not leaking out. I would buy again and see if they have different scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to use this, it has everything needed for a clean wash. It comes with the soap, the wash, and two oil bottles. It said on the instructions that it isn’t recommended for pregnant women, which is weird! As for why it wouldn’t if it is made out of natural ingredients, unless it isn’t . For that reason, I didn’t use it, so I can’t speak on the benefits as I’m currently expecting.
